               ┌────────────────────────────────────────┐ 
            50 │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡸│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⢇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⢇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡎⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡜⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃⠈⡆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡸⠸⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⠀⢇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡎⠀│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⡠⠳⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⠃⠀⢣⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡜⠀⠀⢱⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀│ 
   Y-LABEL     │⠤⢤⠼⠤⠤⠵⡤⠤⠤⠤⢤⠧⠤⠤⠼⡤⠤⠤⠤⢤⠧⠤⠤⠬⡦⠤⠤⠤⢴⠥⠤⠤⠬⡦⠤⠤⠤⢼⠤⠤│ 
               │⡠⠃⠀⠀⠀⠀⠱⡀⠀⠀⡜⠀⠀⠀⠀⢱⠀⠀⠀⡸⠀⠀⠀⠀⢣⠀⠀⠀⡸⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀⡜⠀⠀│ 
               │⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠱⡀⡰⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⢀⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⡀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⠀│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠱⠃⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⡀⡸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢇⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠘⡄⠀⢰⠁⠀⠀│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢇⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⡎⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡇⠀⢸⠀⠀⠀│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣇⠇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⠀⡇⠀⠀⠀│ 
               │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠹⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠘⣄⠇⠀⠀⠀│ 
           -50 │⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀│ 
               └────────────────────────────────────────┘ 
               1                                       10
